inviteHelp.question: How do I invite CleverBot?
inviteHelp.answer: CleverBot's permanent invite is on the CleverBot website

howToBind.question: How do I bind CleverBot to a channel?
howToBind.answer: To start chatting with CleverBot, use the `bind` command to bind CleverBot to a channel.

howToUse.question: How do I <insert action here>
howToUse.answer: Documentation on CleverBot's commands is available on the CleverBot website

noResponse.question: CleverBot will not respond to any of my messages!
noResponse.answer:
If CleverBot stops responding to your messages it may mean one of three things 
A: Offline
B: CleverBot is now bound to the current channel
C: Database corruption. In any case, try rebinding CleverBot to a channel. If that does not work, please contact me at **skylarmccauley864@gmail.com**

botSoSlow.question: Why is the CleverBot so slow?
botSoSlow.answer: You may be trying to use CleverBot during a peak traffic period.

howToUpvote.question: How do I upvote CleverBot?
howToUpvote.answer:: You can upvote CleverBot by going to its Discord Bot List page.

canHelpDev.question: Can I help out with CleverBot development?
canHelpDev.answer: If you think you the skills to help out with development. Contant me at **skylarmccauley864@gmail.com**

whenNextUpdate.question: When will the next update be released?
whenNextUpdate.answer: CleverBot gets a steady stream of updates every few weeks. Stay tuned for announcements!

canFeatureAdd.question: Can <insert feature here> be added to CleverBot?
canFeatureAdd.answer: If you have any ideas for features to be added to the bot. Make a suggestion through the `support` command or on the CleverBot Discord Server.

howTogglePings.question: How can I disable CleverBot's pings?
howTogglePings.answer: As of v1.6, you can now disable CleverBot's pings with `toggle mentions`

howToggleAnnouncements.question: How can I disable CleverBot's announcements?
howToggleAnnouncements.answer: As of v1.6, you can now disable CleverBot's announcements with `toggle announcements`
